participant_1.background:
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to sew and create clothes that are both stylish and unique.
I love to work with my hands and create things.
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party.
I am single and enjoy my independence.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
I love that you are proud of your ability to sew and create clothes. I am not so good at that, but I love to cook!
That's great! I do enjoy cooking sometimes too. I've been wanting to try making some new recipes.
I love trying new recipes. I just made a new cake recipe for my birthday party that was a big hit.
Ooh, what kind of cake was it?
It was a chocolate cake with chocolate frosting. It was delicious!
That sounds amazing! I love chocolate cake.
Me too! It's my favorite kind of cake.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks in the park with my dog. He's a golden retriever named Bailey.
Aw, that sounds so cute! I love dogs. I have a cat named Shadow.
I love cats too! They're so cuddly.
Yeah, Shadow is a big cuddler. He loves to be held.
I'm glad you have such a cute pet.
Thank you! I love him.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be great! I'd love to meet you in person.
Me too! I'll send you a message and we can figure out a time to get together.
Great! I look forward to it
